## Dependencies

https://gist.github.com/shanbhardwaj/866f20e98303379ca8bfbe2f0c5b7a87

```bash
sudo apt install libpng-dev libjpeg-dev libtiff-dev
sudo apt install imagemagick libmagickwand-dev
sudo apt-get install libgtk-3-dev
sudo apt install libxpm-dev libgif-dev libgnutls28-dev
sudo apt install libtinfo-dev libncurses-dev 
sudo apt install tree-sitter-cli libtree-sitter-dev
sudo apt build-dep emacs
# E: You must put some 'deb-src' URIs in your sources.list
sudo software-properties-gtk # and turn on source code
```

## get sources

https://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/emacs/

## build

```bash
./configure --prefix=$HOME/sw
make -j 16
make install
```

## add melpa pacakages

include in `.emacs` file
```
(require 'package)
(add-to-list 'package-archives '("melpa" . "https://melpa.org/packages/") t)
(package-initialize)
```

if there are problems with the gpg keys for packages, see
https://metaredux.com/posts/2019/12/09/dealing-with-expired-elpa-gpg-keys.html
